result.name: occupational-health
result.notes: Occupational Health providers: Have visibility of a range of data relating to individuals who are referred to them by managers/HR. This will include data relating to age, medical history and working arrangements. The Management Information reports produced by Health Management include data on the number of management referrals by month, Division and Directorate, the number of workstation assessments by month, Division and Directorate, the number of ill health retirement referrals by month, Division and Directorate, the number of management referrals split by illness and Directorate, health trends and benchmarking data for illnesses by various service sectors.
result.title: Occupational Health

extras.value: N/A Internal Use Only.  Reports only provided to HR Section - not published wider.
